mapper.insert: insert into notice (n_code, m_code, title, job_type, personnel, end_date, hour_wage, gender, age, term, work_day, work_time1, work_time2, p_date, viewcnt, address, content, work_place_name, education, career, employment_type, assigned_task, education_etc, major, preferential_conditions) values( #{n_code}, #{m_code}, #{title}, #{job_type}, #{personnel}, #{end_date}, #{hour_wage}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{term}, #{work_day}, #{work_time1}, #{work_time2}, #{p_date}, #{viewcnt}, #{address}, #{content}, #{work_place_name}, #{education}, #{career}, #{employment_type}, #{assigned_task}, #{education_etc}, #{major}, #{preferential_conditions})
mapper.select: SELECT n_code, m_code, title, job_type, personnel, end_date, hour_wage, gender, age, term, work_day, work_time1, work_time2, p_date, viewcnt, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,' ',1,3)),INSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,' ',1,3)),'/')+1) address, content, work_place_name, education, documents, interview, contact_number, career, employment_type, assigned_task, education_etc, major, preferential_conditions, salary, is_delete FROM notice WHERE is_delete IS NULL

SELECT a.n_code, a.m_code, a.title, a.job_type, a.personnel, a.end_date, a.hour_wage, a.gender, a.age, a.term, a.work_day, a.work_time1, a.work_time2, a.p_date, a.viewcnt, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(a.address,0,INSTR(a.address,'/',1,2)-1),INSTR(SUBSTR(a.address,0,INSTR(a.address,'/',1,2)),'/')+1) address, a.content, a.work_place_name, a.education, a.documents, a.interview, a.contact_number, a.career, a.employment_type, a.assigned_task, a.education_etc, a.major, a.preferential_conditions, a.salary ,SUBSTR(SUBSTR(n_code,INSTR(n_code,'/',1)+1),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(n_code,INSTR(n_code,'/',1)+1),' ')) n_code_date, b.name, b.phone, b.email FROM notice a , member b where a.m_code = b.m_code and a.n_code = #{n_code}

SELECT n_code, m_code, title, job_type, personnel, end_date, hour_wage, gender, age, term, work_day, work_time1, work_time2, p_date, viewcnt, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,' ',1,3)),INSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,' ',1,3)),'/')+1) address, content, work_place_name, education, documents, interview, contact_number, career, employment_type, assigned_task, education_etc, major, preferential_conditions, salary, is_delete FROM notice where m_code = 'c'||#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET is_delete = '1' WHERE n_code = #{delete_n_code}
